npcCharacters.Dialogue1: Welcome to the Backwards Circuit, Racer!
npcCharacters.Dialogue4: 'W' is to reverse and 'A' and 'D' to turn

npcCharacters.Dialogue2: You're gonna have to be pretty fast to beat the Gary

npcCharacters.Dialogue: Why are you talking in third person?

npcCharacters.Dialogue1: Don't mind him, you'll put him in place in due time
npcCharacters.Dialogue2: But first we have to get you warmed up!
npcCharacters.Dialogue3: Pass through all the checkpoints on the path
npcCharacters.Dialogue4: And it would be in your best interest not to fall of as well
